DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess Potential Interactions Between iv Cocaine and RPR 102681
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Potential Interactions Between Cocaine and RPR 102681 - 1
DOC.detailed_description: Phase I, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Dose Escalating Assessment of Potential Interactions Between Intravenous Cocaine and RPR 102681
DOC.criteria: Includes but is not limited to: Nontreatment seekers DSMIV criteria for cocaine abuse or dependence Ability to verbalize understanding of consent form and provide written informed consent and verbalize willingness to complete study procedures; be able to comply with protocol requirements Please contact site for more information.
